welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colmenarejo, a charming town nestled in the heart of Spain known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password provided by the airport staff.
